CustomField.description: Indicates which Product Notification Category(ies) are relevant to a given contact. These categories are manually populated and allow for targeted notifications to impacted contacts.There are 11 Product Notification Categories organized around similarities in consumables and/or workflows. These categories are: Default, iSeq, MiSeq, NextSeq, NovaSeq, Arrays, Software, Oncology Workflows, Reproductive Health Workflows, Genetic Disease Workflows, Infectious Disease Workflows.(CN-MAY-2022 , PM-10)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Identifies the product categories relevant to the selected product notification contacts. Contacts will receive product notifications according to the product notification category selected for them. Contacts with 'Default (ALL)' category will receive ALL product notifications applicable to the Account.
CustomField.label: Product Notifications Categories
